channel.title: [pi] doors
channel.description:
Ok, well im working on my source and im trying to open the fally barber shop door, well i did everything right and it doesnt want to run.
[code]door = 2949 3379 0 -2 1 //fally hair shop door = 2948 3379 0 -1 1[/code]
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 30 at server.world.ObjectHandler.loadDoorConfig(ObjectHandler.java:284) at server.world.ObjectHandler.<init>(ObjectHandler.java:26) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:63) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This happens when i try to run the server.

youl need to find a good place but add this

			case Door ID:
		             player.getActionSender().sendCreateObject(Door ID, 0, 2948, 3379, -2, 0);
